net.hockeyapp.android

Class LoginManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.hockeyapp.android.LoginManager

  • public class LoginManager
extends java.lang.Object

    Description

    The LoginManager displays the auth activity.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int LOGIN_MODE_ANONYMOUS
      The default mode for authorization.
      static int LOGIN_MODE_EMAIL_ONLY
      Testers/users need a HockeyApp account and have to provide their email address to use the app.
      static int LOGIN_MODE_EMAIL_PASSWORD
      Testers/users need a HockeyApp account and have to provide their email address and password to use the app.
      static int LOGIN_MODE_VALIDATE
      Same as LOGIN_MODE_EMAIL_PASSWORD and HockeySDK will check if the user has access to the app.

      LoginManager()

      • LOGIN_MODE_ANONYMOUS

        public static final int LOGIN_MODE_ANONYMOUS
        The default mode for authorization. User's won't be authorized.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • LOGIN_MODE_EMAIL_ONLY

        public static final int LOGIN_MODE_EMAIL_ONLY
        Testers/users need a HockeyApp account and have to provide their email address to use the app.

        public static final int LOGIN_MODE_EMAIL_PASSWORD
        Testers/users need a HockeyApp account and have to provide their email address and password to use the app.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

        public static final int LOGIN_MODE_VALIDATE
        Same as LOGIN_MODE_EMAIL_PASSWORD and HockeySDK will check if the user has access to the app.
        See Also:

    • Method Detail

      • register

        public static void register(android.content.Context context,
                            java.lang.String appSecret,
                            int mode)
        Registers new login manager. HockeyApp App Identifier is read from configuration values in AndroidManifest.xml.
        Parameters:
        context - The context to use. Usually your Activity object. Has to be of class Activity or subclass for interactive login.
        appSecret - The App Secret of your app on HockeyApp.
        mode - The login mode to use.

      • register

        public static void register(android.content.Context context,
                            java.lang.String appIdentifier,
                            java.lang.String appSecret,
                            int mode,
                            LoginManagerListener listener)
        Registers new LoginManager.
        Parameters:
        context - the context to use. Usually your Activity object.
        appIdentifier - the App ID of your app on HockeyApp.
        appSecret - the App Secret of your app on HockeyApp.
        mode - the login mode.
        listener - instance of LoginListener

      • register

        public static void register(android.content.Context context,
                            java.lang.String appIdentifier,
                            java.lang.String appSecret,
                            int mode,
                            java.lang.Class<?> activity)
        Registers new LoginManager.
        Parameters:
        context - The context to use. Usually your Activity object.
        appIdentifier - App ID of your app on HockeyApp.
        appSecret - The App Secret of your app on HockeyApp.
        mode - The Login Mode.
        activity - The first activity to be started by your app.

      • register

        public static void register(android.content.Context context,
                            java.lang.String appIdentifier,
                            java.lang.String appSecret,
                            java.lang.String urlString,
                            int mode,
                            java.lang.Class<?> activity)
        Registers new LoginManager.
        Parameters:
        context - The context to use. Usually your Activity object.
        appIdentifier - App ID of your app on HockeyApp.
        appSecret - The App Secret of your app on HockeyApp.
        urlString - The URL of the HockeyApp service
        mode - The Login Mode.
        activity - The first activity to be started by your app.

      • verifyLogin

        public static void verifyLogin(android.app.Activity context,
                               android.content.Intent intent)
        Checks the authentication status. If not authenticated at all it will start the LoginActivity. If the user has authenticated before, the SDK will not check for authorization again or validate the user's access to the app. In case of LOGIN_MODE_VALIDATE, it will verify if the user is still allowed to use this app. In case the user tries to navigate back from the login dialog (LoginActivity), it \aAlso exits the app.
        Parameters:
        context - The activity from which this method is called.
        intent - The intent that the activity has been created with.
